lexUnit.name: retirement.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the action or fact of retiring.

sentence.text: Tony Weller , on his retirement as a coachman , sets up ` an excellent public-house " there , PP 57 .
OLIVE Booth says goodbye to friends and colleagues on her retirement as a lithographer after 15 years ' service in the decorating department at Tuscan .
